title: Professional BlondMe Bond Enforcing Clay Lightener 7+
features: Up to 7 levels of lift. Integrated Bonding Technology.
description: Discover BlondMe Bond Enforcing Clay Lightener a premium soft-to-solid formula that creates an outer-shell, allowing the lightener to stay moist on the inside while unleashing its full lightening power within the hair.
